confirmReload.message: This extension requires you to reload tabs after installing. Please reload the current tab.

loginToTeamsLink.message: You can switch to other teams after signing in to them

extensionDescription.message: Screenshot websites, save images, share instantly.

welcomeDesc.message: Screenshot websites, save images, share instantly.

upgradeLink.message: For more advanced features, check out Gyazo Pro
